title.rendered: “Inside IDF’s Ongoing Operations: Neutralizing Threats & Discovering Combat Materials in Gaza Strip”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF forces continue to fight in the heart of Jabalia camp, central Gaza Strip and in the Rafah area; Several terrorist squads that shot towards our troops have been neutralized.

Troops of Division 98 continue to operate in the heart of Jabalia camp. The combat team of Brigade 7 located combat materials, including Kalashnikov-type weapons and warehouses, and eliminated terrorists who approached them with tank fire.

Division 99, led by the Brigade Combat Team 679, continue to operate in the center of the Gaza Strip. During the past day, the forces located a weapons warehouse in the area.

The forces of Division 162 continue to operate in the Rafah area. In one of the confrontations, the combat team of the Givati Brigade identified three terrorists who fired at the forces. An Air Force combat aircraft attacked and eliminated the terrorists. The combat teams of the Nahal Brigade and Brigade 12 found numerous terrorist infrastructures and combat means in the past day, including anti-tank positions, tunnel mouths, weapon warehouses, explosives, and more.

In the past day, rockets were fired at our forces in the Jabalia area. The forces identified two terrorists exiting the building from which the shooting took place. Led by the Air Force and the Gaza Division, an aircraft attacked and eliminated the terrorists.

During the past day, Air Force combat aircraft attacked over 50 targets throughout the Gaza Strip.

Enclosed is documentation from the IDF’s activities in the Gaza Strip: https://bit.ly/3yyVhPK

Enclosed is documentation of IDF attacks in the Gaza Strip: https://bit.ly/3x2Me9i

Enclosed is a photo of the combat means discovered by fighters of the 679 Artillery Corps: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC30052024239846624

Enclosed is a photo of the launcher found by the 12 Artillery Corps forces: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC30052024239746

Enclosed are photos from IDF activities in the Gaza Strip: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC300520248732463
